page.title: Massimo Lauria @ CS Department - Publications, papers, surveys...

meta.name: description
meta.content: List of publications of Massimo Lauria

page.p: This is the list of my papers. It is supposed to me more up to date than my DBLP profile. The copyright of the papers belongs to the publisher. In this page there are preprint which are essentially equivalent, and can be only downloaded for personal or academic purposes.
